EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #2.2021 Dealer Update #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - December 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | December 2020 New Sales Bulletin Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletin:
- 2021-19 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-19---DU-875-LCD-Display-Unit-Upgrades-for-All-Platforms.pdf]]> DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrade for Business Aviation
Dealers can find this bulletin on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
